description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play it in your 3DTV. 4 Stereoscopic modes with adjustable depth perception. Drive a spaceship in a survival trip around the galaxy. Blasting asteroids will create new portals that allow you to go to an other space environment. Try 10 levels of speed and gravity. How long can you survive?
